import {Component} from 'react' import Cookies from 'js-cookie' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {BsSearch} from 'react-icons/bs' import './index.css' class Search extends Component { state = {inputSearch: ''} componentDidMount() { this.getSearchInput() } getSearchInput = async () => { const {inputSearch} = this.state console.log(inputSearch) const apiKey = Cookies.get('request_token') const url = `https://api.themoviedb.org/3/search/movie?api_key=${apiKey}&language=en-US&query=${inputSearch}&page={1}` const options = { method: 'GET', } const response = await fetch(url, options) const data = await response.json() console.log(data) } changeInput = event => { console.log(event.target.value) this.setState({inputSearch: event.target.value}) // history.replace(`/search/${event.target.value}`) } render() { const {inputSearch} = this.state return (
  • Home
  • Popular
{inputSearch === '' ? (

Search Movies

) : null}
) } } export default Search
